title: Light Street Gains 37% in Big Year for Stock-Picking Hedge Funds
description: Light Street Capital Management soared more than 37% last year, outperforming other stock-picking hedge funds, and making investors whole following steep losses in 2021 and 2022.
content: Light Street Capital Management soared more than 37% last year, outperforming other stock-picking hedge funds, and making investors whole following steep losses in 2021 and 2022.
